12:36 <+evalica> I know already vincent mentioned something about the latest .zip packages for the snapshot, but for 3 days at least I am not able to test the latest snapshots because the start\_xwiki.sh doesn't react. I get a java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused and doesn't want to start. Just wanted to know if someone knows why is that?  
12:38 <+evalica> all the test I've made I done them on the 4.1 RC1  
12:39 <+evalica> ok … so as Edy says the problem is that start\_xwiki.sh doesn't has '+x' execute rights

17:37 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
17:37 <jvelociter> Hi guys  
17:37 <jvelociter> I've got a 401 from nexus when doing release:perform on a contrib project  
17:37 <jvelociter> following instructions at http://contrib.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome  
17:38 <jvelociter> the pom is this one https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/xwiki-ace-editor/blob/master/pom.xml  
17:38 <jvelociter> any idea what could be the cause ?  
17:39 <@cjd> do you have some backscroll?  
17:40 <jvelociter> cjd, you mean log ?  
17:40 <jvelociter> yep  
17:40 <@cjd> yeah  
17:41 <jvelociter> http://pastebin.com/axkrgb8v  
17:42 <jvelociter> I remember doing successful contrib uploads in the past  
17:42 <@cjd> what node are you on? agent1?  
17:42 <jvelociter> none  
17:42 <jvelociter> I'm on my machine  
17:42 <@cjd> hmm make sure you've got the right settings.xml entry  
17:43 <jvelociter> cjd, ahhh you got me. I've reset it couple of days ago to try and fix another build, didn't put it back  
17:44 <@cjd> cool  
17:46 <jvelociter> SUCCESS  
17:46 <jvelociter> :)  
17:46 <jvelociter> thanks  
17:57 <jvdrean1> cjd: XWIKI-7911 should be fixed, there was still and issue but with my last commits it should be fine now  
17:57 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
18:02 <jamie\_\_wiki> Is there a reason why com.xpn.xwiki.doc.XWikiAttachment replaces all "+" in the filename with spaces when setFilename() is called?

18:05 <@cjd> jvdrean1: thanks, I just want to use something to bulster my memory since if everything is closed, I might very well just wake up monday and release
